creator: pathardepavan@gmail.com
text: Hi i wanted to make the build process for various android projects automated. The first tool i looked into was ant. I wanted to know whether this can be made as Android Build tool

I have never tried to build an Android application myself, but some of Ant's
users may have, so it would be far better if you asked your question on
the user mailing list rather the bug tracker.

Searching for "Apache Ant Android" with your favorite search engine is likely
to produce lots of results (in my case it did).  <http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/building/building-cmdline.html>
looks as if Ant was pretty well supported by the Android community.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
